Seven-factor risk assessment for departing employees:
• Senior/strategy role assessment
• Sensitive trade secret exposure evaluation
• Information retention/destruction analysis
• Departure circumstances review
• Competitor destination assessment
• Concealment behavior evaluation
• Employee trustworthiness assessment

Comprehensive exit interview protocols:
• Standardized exit interview checklists
• Multi-person interview teams for high-risk departures
• Documentation of interview outcomes
• Escalation procedures for concerning responses

Systematic recovery of company property and information:
• Complete inventory of company property
• Electronic data recovery from all devices
• Personal device inspection protocols
• Cloud account and shared folder review

Immediate termination of all system access:
• Real-time access disabling procedures
• VPN and remote access termination
• Physical access control updates
• Verification of access termination completion

Forensic preservation of electronic evidence:
• Device imaging and preservation protocols
• Email account backup and preservation
• Chain of custody documentation
• Forensic investigation capabilities

Formal certification of ongoing obligations:
• Signed certification of information return
• Acknowledgment of ongoing confidentiality obligations
• Review of restrictive covenant obligations
• Documentation of certification process

Ongoing communication after employee departure:
• Reminder letters to former employees
• Current employee briefings on confidentiality
• New employer notification protocols
• Monitoring for potential misappropriation

Response to suspected trade secret misappropriation:
• Incident identification and classification
• Evidence preservation procedures
• Legal consultation and response options
• Documentation and reporting requirements
